original_title: Someone Behind the Door Knocks at Irregular Intervals
overview: Julia spends the day at the leisure centre where she slips into a sombre reverie. As her thoughts continue she becomes aware of the possibility that perhaps she never came here at all. Outside in the sun, the stillness changes the road, itâ€™s inherent notion of speed has dissipated, allowing the surface to be felt.  The film suggests ideas of non-activity and meditation, memory and perception. It explores the relationship between contemplation and the act of looking.
title: Someone Behind the Door Knocks at Irregular Intervals
